news.title: Naeem Revives Spank Rock for New Song “Bankroll Peelers”: Listen
news.summary: The single features a guest verse from his old alter ego and backing vocals from Arctic Monkeys drummer Matt Helders

news.title: Chance the Rapper Announces Fall 2025 Tour
news.summary: The Chicago rapper will celebrate his new album, Star Line, with a string of shows across North America

news.title: Amaarae, No Joy, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
news.summary: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat

news.title: Bobby Whitlock, Derek & the Dominos Co-Founder and Storied Session Musician, Dies at 77
news.summary: The late rock and blues musician played on classic albums by George Harrison, Eric Clapton, and others
